title: Comets: time capsules of the solar system
creator_credit: Charles L. Finance, Media Four Productions and Walt Disney Educational Media Company
brief_description: Animation sequences are combined with live footage to explore the role comets play in contemporary science research about the solar system’s beginnings. Shows how man’s knowledge of comets has evolved from superstitious fear to a growing understanding of their composition and structure.
